archive.title: Detective Journal
archive.description: The following pages contain my investigation into the suspicious activities of Tetiana Gurkivska, a suspected mastermind of digital innovations...

basetis.title: Basetis Investigation
basetis.description: This investigation compiles evidence of Tetiana Gurkivska's activities: development of two full-fledged web applications with authentication (JWT, OAuth2), CRM module, Vitest testing, and data visualization.

softpro.title: Softpro Incident
softpro.description: New findings indicate rapid expansion of technical capabilities: development of internal libraries, Mapbox-based mapping, ECharts-based data visualization, and geodata processing.

docsSpace.title: DocsSpace Operation
docsSpace.description: Development of two web applications, a desktop app, a Telegram bot, payment processing features, and data prediction tools.

science.title: Scientific Community
science.description: Development of applications for the Ukrainian scientific community using Electron, Vue, and Node.js.

mriia.title: Mriia.events Project
mriia.description: Contributed to the development of a web application for managing public events based on React (Next.js).

projects.calendar: Web application for scheduling tasks and events with notifications.
